statements: UPDATE social_media_sentiment_analysis SET sentiment_score = 0.8 WHERE user_id = 12345;
UPDATE social_media_sentiment_analysis SET post_text = 'New post content' , username = 'john_doe' WHERE post_date = '2022-09-15';
UPDATE social_media_sentiment_analysis SET sentiment_score = 4.5, post_date = '2022-05-20 12:00:00' WHERE user_id = 12345;
UPDATE social_media_sentiment_analysis SET post_text = 'Enjoying the sunshine today!', sentiment_score = 3.8 WHERE username = 'john_doe';
UPDATE social_media_posts SET sentiment_score = 0.8 WHERE post_id = 'ce8d4932-1c68-4b06-b5a3-bb0d4ff18a8a';
UPDATE user_profiles SET followers_count = 5000, following_count = 200 WHERE user_id = 'a20d76b5-64bc-456f-b14d-0544fb152c8f';
UPDATE social_media_posts SET sentiment_score = 8.7, post_content = 'Updated content' WHERE post_id = 'a0eebc99-9c0b-4ef8-bb6d-6bb9bd380a11';
UPDATE user_profiles SET followers_count = 1000, username = 'new_username' WHERE user_id = 'b576b00f-c305-4340-a843-fda2c7740514';
UPDATE social_media_users SET followers_count = 500 WHERE user_id = 12345;
UPDATE posts SET comments_count = 50, likes_count = 100 WHERE post_id = 98765;
UPDATE social_media_users SET followers_count = followers_count + 10 WHERE user_id = 1001;
UPDATE posts SET likes_count = likes_count + 1, comments_count = comments_count - 1 WHERE post_id = 2005;
UPDATE users SET username = 'new_username' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE posts SET post_content = 'Updated content' WHERE post_id = 2;
UPDATE users SET email='updated_email@example.com', join_date='2022-01-01' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE posts SET post_content='Updated post content', post_date='2022-02-15' WHERE user_id=2 AND post_id=5;
UPDATE users SET email='newemail@example.com' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE posts SET post_content='Updated post content' WHERE post_id=2;
UPDATE users SET email = 'newemail@example.com', join_date = '2022-01-01' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE comments SET comment_content = 'Updated content for comment', comment_date = '2022-02-15' WHERE comment_id = 3;
